segments.text: Have you ever sung with a karaoke ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do it quite often .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Karaoke has become a major entertainment . I wonder why .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much fun is there in singing in front of other people , especially if you don't sing well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah , that's the biggest fun of all . You see , even though you're not a good singer , people will listen to you .
segments.speaker: S2
